casebody.data:
Amy S. GRISSOM
v.
David I. COHEN No. 40P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 5, 2018 Jonathan D. Feit, Attorney at Law, Preston O. Odom, III, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Grissom, Amy S. Tom J. Bush, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, Kevin L. Miller, Attorney at Law, H. Stephen Robinson, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, for Cohen, David I.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Plaintiff on the 5th of February 2018 in this matter for discretionary review under G.S. 7A-31 prior to a determination by the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of April 2018."
